name: pnp-sp-dev-spfx-web-parts-react-copilot-apis
title: Microsoft 365 Copilot Chat and Search with Work IQ in SPFx
shortDescription: SharePoint Framework web parts that integrate Microsoft 365 Copilot Chat and Search APIs to create interactive AI assistants with conversational history and intelligent document search.
longDescription: This sample demonstrates how to integrate Microsoft 365 Copilot Chat and Search APIs into SharePoint Framework React web parts. It includes two web parts: Copilot Chat provides a full conversational interface with chat history, allowing users to interact with Microsoft 365 Copilot directly from SharePoint with features like scrollable conversation history, markdown rendering for AI responses, optional web search integration, support for file references and additional context, and the ability to start new conversations. Copilot Search enables hybrid semantic and lexical search using natural language queries, displaying results with document titles, authors, preview text with keyword highlighting, and direct links to documents. Both web parts leverage Work IQ Copilot APIs to provide enterprise-grade AI capabilities within SharePoint.

references.name: Build your first SharePoint client-side web part
references.description: Client-side web parts are client-side components that run in the context of a SharePoint page. Client-side web parts can be deployed to SharePoint environments that support the SharePoint Framework. You can also use modern JavaScript web frameworks, tools, and libraries to build them.
